net.proteusframework.ui.search

Interface SearchUI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContextSource, net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable<Component>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchUIImpl

    public interface SearchUI
extends net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable<Component>, net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContextSource
    Represents a search UI.

    Unless otherwise noted, all entities passed to and from an SearchUI implementation must be attached.

    See package documentation for typical use.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • clearSelection

        void clearSelection()
        Clear the selection

      • doAction

        void doAction(SearchUIAction action)
        Do the specified action
        Parameters:
        action - the action.

      • getComponent

        Component getComponent()
        Get the search UI component.

        This is useful for displaying dialogs, getting access to session information, or queuing ExternalActions.

        Do not use this to manipulate the UI in any other way, use the Workspace or History property for that.

        Returns:
        the search UI component.

      • getCurrentSearchQLBuilder

        QLBuilder getCurrentSearchQLBuilder()
        Get the current search criteria as a mutable QLBuilder.
        Returns:
        the builder.

      • getHistory

        History getHistory()
        Get the history. This can be used to replace the entire search UI. Useful for editing a record or drilling down into some data. A similar UI can be provided by the worksace property as well.
        Returns:
        the history.

      • getLeadSelection

        <S> S getLeadSelection()
        Get the lead selection.
        Type Parameters:
        S - selection type.
        Returns:
        the selection or null.

      • getSearchResultLimit

        @Nullable
SearchResultLimit getSearchResultLimit()
        Get the selected result limit.
        Returns:
        the result limit or null.

      • getSearchSupplier

        SearchSupplier getSearchSupplier()
        Get the search supplier used by this UI. May be null when and only when the UI is not inited, there is no search result supplier selected, or when the search result supplier is invalid. When handling an event from a search UI, should not be null.
        Returns:
        the search supplier or null in specified cases only

      • getSelection

        <S> List<? extends S> getSelection()
        Get the selection.
        Type Parameters:
        S - selection type.
        Returns:
        the selection or empty list.

      • getSelectionCount

        int getSelectionCount()
        Get the number of selected items.
        Returns:
        the number of selected items. If the number is unknown, then implementations may return -1.

      • getSelectionQLBuilder

        @Nullable
QLBuilder getSelectionQLBuilder()
        Get the selection as a QLBuilder.
        Returns:
        the resolver. May be null if it is not possible to obtain a QLBuilder in which case getSelection() may be used.

      • getTimeZone

        TimeZone getTimeZone()
        Get the time zone.
        Returns:
        the time zone.

      • getWorkspace

        Workspace getWorkspace()
        Get the workspace.
        Returns:
        the workspace or null if not part of a workspace.
